haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Obltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Carsten Kantner

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 01/07/1916 near Auberive.
A Nieuport 17.C1 GBR of Esc N.31 was brought down by Rupert Freudenberg of Jasta 4.
Lt Hyacinthe Farel was killed in action.
Rupert Freudenberg was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 01/07/1916 near Sampigny.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.49 was brought down by Gebhard Zinn of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Guy Kalandyk was killed in action.
Gebhard Zinn was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 01/07/1916 near Moncel-sur-Seille.
A F.E.2b of Esc 29 was brought down by Mario Falck of Jasta 4.
Sergt Pierre Riou was killed in action.
Lt Corentin Anglada was killed in action.
Mario Falck was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 01/07/1916 near Monchy-au-Bois.
A F.E.2b of No 2 Squadron RFC was brought down by Simon Gans of Jasta 4.
Maj Vaughan Widdowson was killed in action.
Lt Roswell Bexley was killed in action.
Simon Gans was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 01/07/1916 near Guiscard.
A F.E.2b of Esc 227 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 4.
Hyacinthe MChannel was not injured.
Robert Demoulin was not injured.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 01/07/1916 near Bouconville-sur-Madt.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.102 was brought down by Jonas Rowohlt of Jasta 4.
Sergt Philippe Hocquinghen was killed in action.
Jonas Rowohlt was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 01/07/1916 near Suippes.
A Nieuport 17.C1 GBR of Esc N.124 Lafayette was brought down by Ewald Stock of Jasta 4.
Cpl Eugene Riffault was killed in action.
Ewald Stock was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 01/07/1916 near Beuvry.
A F.E.2b of Esc 107 was brought down by Hasso Lobe of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Denis Westrelin was killed in action.
S/Lt Antoine Gentillon was killed in action.
Hasso Lobe was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 01/07/1916 near Troyon.
A F.E.2b of Esc 111 was brought down by Rupert Puckler of Jasta 4.
Lt Nicolas Fournier was killed in action.
Lt Cyprien Couturier was killed in action.
Rupert Puckler was  flying a Fokker E.III.


Pilots lost were: 
    Obltn Patrik Schorner: Injured
